caster:GateOfBabylon.NAME: Gate of Babylon
caster:GateOfBabylon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for every unique_spell in your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for every unique_spell in your deck. NL Unique Spells: !M!

caster:LightningBolt.NAME: Lightning Bolt
caster:LightningBolt.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Lightning. NL Deal !caster:D! damage.

caster:FlashFrost.NAME: Flash Frost
caster:FlashFrost.DESCRIPTION: Ice. NL Apply !M! Frost. NL Exhaust.

caster:JupitelThunder.NAME: Jupitel Thunder
caster:JupitelThunder.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Lightning. NL Deal !caster:D! damage !M! times.

caster:Incinerate.NAME: Incinerate
caster:Incinerate.DESCRIPTION: Fire. NL Exhaust !M! card from your hand. NL Apply Blazed equal to !caster:M2! times its cost.

caster:NaturalChaos.NAME: Natural Chaos
caster:NaturalChaos.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Earth. NL Apply !M! Mired to ALL enemies.

caster:AlternatingCurrent.NAME: Alternating Current
caster:AlternatingCurrent.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Lightning. NL Deal !caster:D! damage to a random enemy. NL Channel a copy of this card.

caster:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
caster:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Gain block equal to the sum of the Cast_time for your currently channeled spells.
caster:Accumulation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain block equal to !M! + the sum of the Cast_time for your currently channeled spells.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain block equal to the sum of the Cast_time for your currently channeled spells. NL Currently: !B!
Gain block equal to !M! + the sum of the Cast_time for your currently channeled spells. NL Currently: !B!

caster:FrostDriver.NAME: Frost Driver
caster:FrostDriver.DESCRIPTION: Gain !caster:B! Block. NL Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Ice. NL Deal !caster:D! damage.

caster:MagicResonance.NAME: Magic Resonance
caster:MagicResonance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each spell you are currently casting.

caster:MagicAttunement.NAME: Magic Attunement
caster:MagicAttunement.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Soul_Strike to your hand.

caster:SoulStrike.NAME: Soul Strike
caster:SoulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Neutral. NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Exhaust.

caster:Fissure.NAME: Fissure
caster:Fissure.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Earth. NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL Enemies. NL Apply !M! Stun to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

caster:Explosion.NAME: Explosion
caster:Explosion.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Reduce this card's damage by !M! for this combat.

caster:StormGust.NAME: Storm Gust
caster:StormGust.DESCRIPTION: Freeze !M! cards. Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies.
caster:StormGust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Freeze !M! card. Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies.

caster:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
caster:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! for this combat.

caster:LordOfVermillion.NAME: Lord Of Vermillion
caster:LordOfVermillion.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to a random enemy !M! * X times.

caster:MeteorStorm.NAME: Meteor Storm
caster:MeteorStorm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! zero cost Meteors into your draw pile.

caster:Incantation.NAME: Incantation
caster:Incantation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the Cast_Time of a random card in your hand by 1.
caster:Incantation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the Cast_Time of 2 random cards in your hand by 1.

caster:QuickCast.NAME: Quick Cast
caster:QuickCast.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the Cast_time of a random spell in your hand by !M! until it's played.
caster:QuickCast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce the Cast_time of a spell in your hand by !M! until it's played.

caster:WallOfThorns.NAME: Wall Of Thorns
caster:WallOfThorns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !caster:B! Block. NL Cast_time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block twice and !M! Thorns.

caster:DivertFocus.NAME: Divert Focus
caster:DivertFocus.DESCRIPTION: Gain !caster:B! Block. NL Add !M! to the Cast_time of your casted Spells with the current lowest Cast_time.

caster:BookThrow.NAME: Book Throw
caster:BookThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength for the rest of this turn.

caster:Meteor.NAME: Meteor
caster:Meteor.DESCRIPTION: Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Neutral. NL Deal !caster:D! damage.
